title: Data Source

xdm:tags.description: Tags are used to indicate how the aliases represented by a given datansource should be interpreted by applications using those aliases.nnExamples:nn* `isAVID`: data sources representing Analytics visitor IDs.n* `isCRSKey`: data sources representing aliases that should be used as keys in CRS.nnTags are set when the data source is created but they are also included innpipeline messages when referencing a given data source.n
xdm:tags.title: Tags

xdm:code.description: The code is a shortcut to the full @id and at least one of the code or @id can be used. Sometimes, this code is referred to as the data source integration code.
xdm:code.title: Code

@id.description: The unique ID of this data source. This would be provided by the individual or system that created the data source.n
@id.title: Identifier
